Articles.Content: when the forum hadn't moved it was easy to attach stuff now its almost impossible to know where stuff goes. pls help

With what? Could You explain better? If You want to attach files/images/ect. then there are those options right above where You write Your post, next to the smiley-face. 2 Earth icons, a picture, and a clip icon. Did You mean that?

Simply click the Go Advanced button below the Quick Reply box and all the features you would expect are available. The Quick Reply box is meant for simple and quick replies. If you want to do something more detailed, use the Advanced editor.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
